speaker: Tim Cook, CEO
claim_text: Revenue for the June quarter was $85.8 billion, up 5 percent year over year
context_snippet: We are pleased to report another strong quarter. Revenue for the June quarter was $85.8 billion, up 5 percent year over year.

speaker: Tim Cook, CEO
claim_text: Revenue for the June quarter was $85.8 billion, up 5 percent year over year
context_snippet: Revenue for the June quarter was $85.8 billion, up 5 percent year over year.

speaker: Tim Cook, CEO
claim_text: We generated nearly $29 billion in operating cash flow during the quarter
context_snippet: We generated nearly $29 billion in operating cash flow during the quarter and returned over $32 billion to shareholders.

speaker: Tim Cook, CEO
claim_text: Services revenue reached an all-time record of $24.2 billion, up 14 percent year over year
context_snippet: Services revenue reached an all-time record of $24.2 billion, up 14 percent year over year.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: Gross margin was 46.3 percent, up 100 basis points from a year ago
context_snippet: Gross margin was 46.3 percent, up 100 basis points from a year ago.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: Our operating income was $26.2 billion, representing an operating margin of 30.5 percent
context_snippet: Our operating income was $26.2 billion, representing an operating margin of 30.5 percent.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: Our operating income was $26.2 billion, representing an operating margin of 30.5 percent
context_snippet: Our operating income was $26.2 billion, representing an operating margin of 30.5 percent.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: Earnings per diluted share were $1.40, up 11 percent year over year
context_snippet: Earnings per diluted share were $1.40, up 11 percent year over year.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: We generated $24.1 billion in operating cash flow during the quarter
context_snippet: We generated $24.1 billion in operating cash flow during the quarter. Free cash flow was $20.3 billion.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
claim_text: Net income for the quarter was $21.4 billion
context_snippet: Net income for the quarter was $21.4 billion.

speaker: Luca Maestri, CFO
context_snippet: We ended the quarter with $162 billion in cash plus marketable securities. Total debt was $108 billion.
